sentences.en: I strum my guitar and I sing an outlaw love song.
sentences.cn: 我漫不经心乱弹的声音我的吉他和我唱一首被剥夺法律保护的人情歌.

sentences.en: Mary can come home from any musical show and strum every tune on the piano.
sentences.cn: 玛丽每听过一次音乐会,回到家里都能在钢琴上随意弹出其中的每一首曲子.

sentences.en: This is my opinion about the application of Hand Strum the Lute.
sentences.cn: 这是本人对这手挥琵琶演示的意见.

sentences.en: To strum or pluck ( a stringed instrument ).
sentences.cn: 拨弦演奏或拨弹 ( 一种弦乐器 )

sentences.en: Whenever excited, the composer would strum his tune on the piano even at midnight.
sentences.cn: 只要一兴奋,哪怕是在深夜, 作曲家也会在钢琴上弹奏他的曲子.

sentences.en: You strum away on your harps like David and improvise on musical instruments.
sentences.cn: 5弹琴鼓瑟唱消闲的歌曲,为自己制造乐器,如同大卫所造的.

sentences.en: You strum away on your harps like David improvise on musical instruments.
sentences.cn: 弹琴鼓瑟唱消闲的歌曲,为自己制造乐器,如同大卫所造的.

trans.tran_cn: 轻轻弹奏，漫不经心地拨弄，弹奏出乐曲，弹敲
漫不经心地弹（弦乐器），轻轻弹奏，把…拨弄出声响，用…弹敲
